channel.title: Help with pvp planet source
channel.description:
Hi,maybe someone can help me editing PvP Planet source? I need falowing adds:
1: Change items colours 2. Change pest control reward items (add new,delete,change price) 3. Change shop npc (if now is men,i wana to change it to wolf) 4. Change welcome text in chat. When you conecting,get my text. To post updates and something like this. I really very need it,so please help,if someone can :o And how i can stop dup items in server? can i fix this bug?

item.title: Help with pvp planet source
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

these are very basic. i suggest just search for ids and text in mostly your client class.

Read full topic
